channel.title: Anyone going to Synth Fest France (Nantes 30 march to 1 april)?
channel.description:
I plan to go to this french synth enthusiast meeting.
https://www.facebook.com/SynthFestFrance/
Will there be some other Axoloti fellows there ?

It’s the same werehever i go... We have the will to use it and keep showing it around oh and having fun!

item.title: Anyone going to Synth Fest France (Nantes 30 march to 1 april)?
item.dc:creator: @SmashedTransistors
item.description:
@SmashedTransistors wrote:

The Nantes SynthFest 2018 was a really great event.
Lots of vintage and new instruments (from the Ondioline to the RIVER) and a lot of passionate creators and inventors... some I hadden't met for 15 or 20 years !
I brought two of my Axoloti instruments to play with them.
It made quite an impression as it is a fun and creative platform. But sadly almost nobody was aware of its existence.

I think that the Axoloti deserves to have a wider audience with synth and audio enthusiasts and professionals.

I hope that at the next SynthFest France i won't be the only axolotean ...

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone going to Synth Fest France (Nantes 30 march to 1 april)?

item.title: Anyone going to Synth Fest France (Nantes 30 march to 1 april)?
item.dc:creator: @mtyas Matthew Tyas
item.description:
@mtyas wrote:

I would love to go, now you talk about it.
I'll look into it (places to stay, friends, gigs possible on the way...), and I'll give a definitive answer as soon as possible.
It would be great to have some kind of informal axoloti meet-up (and maybe jam )

Read full topic
